title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Targeted Airstrikes and Successful Interceptions in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked Hezbollah terrorist targets in southern Lebanon in four different areas; a suspicious aerial target was successfully intercepted.

Following alerts about the infiltration of hostile aircraft activated at 19:31 in the Upper Galilee area, air defense fighters successfully intercepted the target. No damage, no injuries.

Air Force fighter jets targeted terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Ayta ash-Shab area in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, fighter jets attacked a military site of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Yaatir area, in addition to the organization’s terrorist infrastructure in the Al-Khiam and Hanin areas in southern Lebanon.

Attached is documentation of the interception: https://we.tl/t-vEr508zs92

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://we.tl/t-eURKdHFLHJ
